FuncDef:
The mapping-policy command creates an SRv6 mapping policy with a specified color and displays the SRv6 mapping policy view.
The undo mapping-policy command deletes an SRv6 mapping policy.
By default, no SRv6 mapping policy is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the color value of an SRv6 mapping policy.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The mapping-policy command creates an SRv6 mapping policy with a specified color and displays the SRv6 mapping policy view.
